content:
Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat
inventory=[{"type": "light_gray_concrete_powder", "quantity": 3, "index": 12}, {"type": "ladder", "quantity": 17, "index": 16}, {"type": "dark_oak_log", "quantity": 2, "index": 22}, {"type": "dead_horn_coral_fan", "quantity": 9, "index": 23}, {"type": "crimson_stairs", "quantity": 23, "index": 34}, {"type": "jungle_pressure_plate", "quantity": 21, "index": 35}, {"type": "melon", "quantity": 54, "index": 40}, {"type": "tipped_arrow", "quantity": 3, "index": 41}, {"type": "turtle_egg", "quantity": 8, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft a dark_oak_boat, I need to craft two dark_oak_planks, which require dark_oak_log. I have dark_oak_log in slot 22, so I will move it to the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 22 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: dark_oak_boat

thought: Now that I have crafted the first dark_oak_planks, I need to move them to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
